text: (itanaiyarinta) musa tan camukattaritam kopattutan, vicanattutan tirumpi vanta potu; (avarkalai nokki)"nan illata camayattil ninkal ceyta ikkariyam mikavum kettatu unkal iraivanutaiya kattalai (vetanai)yaik (kontu vara) avacarappatukirirkala?" Enru kurinar; pinnar vetam varaiyap (perrirunta) palakaikalai erintu vittu, tam catotarar (harun) utaiya talai(muti)yaip pitittut tam pakkam iluttar. Appotu (harun)"en tayin makane! Inta makkal ennai palahinappatutti ennai kolai ceyyavum murpattanar. Akave (ennutaiya)"pakaivarkalukku enmulam makilcciyai erpatutti vitatir" innum ennai aniyayak karak kuttattarutan certtuvitatir" enru kurinar
